item.title: Asdf
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“Brandontan, post:45, topic:400869”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=497925.msg3644130#msg3644130 date=1309238319]
I suggest everyone reading this think twice about applying, the owner is really stupid. He can’t fix the simplest things and I originally was thinking about giving him the fixes for free if he wasn’t going to buy them, but he showed me hes a complete idiot/dick so I didn’t.

Point being, don’t apply! kbai
[/quote]
Please don’t flame me because things like that do not work on me. i’m not stupid and i’m not an idiot. you offered 20m for some fixes. and since i declined that offer you got mad. Do not talk on this post if its going to be hurtful to the development of my server. And also, if i did offend you in any way i’d like to be the better man and apologize for my wrongdoings, so I’m Sorry.
-Brandon[/quote]

I was mad at your arrogant attitude towards me, you were constantly telling me my source wasn’t good, like I don’t already know that? I was trying to help you out, even gave you a discount, but you threw it back in my face.

item.title: Asdf
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“Brandontan, post:39, topic:400869”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=497925.msg3643676#msg3643676 date=1309206603]

Seriously, take Nick’s Tip, SWITCH SOURCES, Path finding is fucked up, annd some others I downloaded the source today, sorry Nick, but it’s ya know… Not good for you, you can do much better.

I fixed the dropping issue and the path finding issue.

How do you know they program with java?

Thats going in my signature!
:facepalm:
[/quote]Come now don’t be stupid, a company that has billions of dollars. A company that have probably some of the best programmers out there working for them. You think that the only thing that is used is Java? You do realize there are several languages that are very similar to Java. Heck, there are rsps’s out there programmed using c++.

The original rsps may had been written in java, but can you prove that’s what Jagex uses?

They program in RuneScript, which converts to java.

Can you give me a link to it? and what kind of glitches does it have? still the agility one? im getting issues with the compiler… i’ve tried many times to fix it and whatnot. my coders are finding out the problem atm. i’ve tried doing things(including putting my form of java into the compiler) if you can’t get back to me soon i can just find another source. but id really like to use yours as it has great potential.

and the Banner looks great. Just got to fix spelling issues and me “server” “Server” lol because its in the title. i added you on skype hopefully we can talk soon. as its a matter of days before server comes up. i can use you for software/gfx designer and maybe if you can handle it, a mod. we’ll check it out soon enough. please get back to me ASAP[/quote]

add me on msn, i wanna talk to you: r0cker_days@hotmail.com

Read full topic

and the Banner looks great. Just got to fix spelling issues and me “server” “Server” lol because its in the title. i added you on skype hopefully we can talk soon. as its a matter of days before server comes up. i can use you for software/gfx designer and maybe if you can handle it, a mod. we’ll check it out soon enough. please get back to me ASAP

item.title: Asdf
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“XombeR, post:37, topic:400869”]E-Mail: tjoyao@live.se
Experience you have: Enough for “what I can do for you”
Age(a must): 20 (1991-05-08)
Apply For: Admin/Any mod.
What can you do for us?:
1: Create a nice looking forum (you can count on a fee for domain names etc tho).
2: Create softwares.
3: I am also a rather good graphics designer.
4: I know all about organizing and how important that is on clients, so as a Admin/mod, I believe I can keep the server clean and nice.
5: I can help you advertise.

Add me on skype if I seem interesting
Skype: “Xomberz” (display name: Gambler)

---- EDIT -----
Here is a preview of my image designing skills.
I made this in 20min so don’t believe this is my best image ever

logo_header1.png800×250

---- EDIT -----
HAHAHAHA! Epic fail by me, I will re-spell the name correctly next time I make a image ^^
Oh well, it was just a preview of my skills anyway :)[/quote]

That actually looks pretty damn good to me. Make the death rune an astral rune (whatever the rune with a star on it is called) then it would be even better. And make the glow a different color.
